lines: 4 rue Denis Papin - ZI La Vigne aux Loups

description.text: The hotel offers comfortable, spacious rooms with 1 to 2 beds and free WiFi, perfect for a one-night stop or a short stay in the region. The nearby RER station puts you halfway between the Palace of Versailles and the centre of Paris. Paris-Orly Airport is just 10 minutes away.
